hidden_resources  baghdad  constantinople  jerusalem  mecca  rome  venice  uppsala  cathar  balkan  russian_expansion  british  levantine  hansa  marinare  hansa_capital  silk_mouth  horde_target  mongol  cumans  norman  baltic  zoroastrian  valencia  ostsiedlung  iceland  magyar  anatolian  armenian  baglerne  bedouin  berber  burgundian  cretan  cypriot  georgian  kurd  khwarazm  montjoie  polack  eesti  sicilian  swedish  toulouse  turkoman  north_scand  dobrzyn  elephants  london  florence  condottieri  bulgar  finnish  flemish  guanche  irish  kanem  mande  nubian  serb  swiss  wallach  welsh  unbuildable  portugal 

building core_building
{
	levels wooden_pallisade wooden_wall stone_wall large_stone_wall huge_stone_wall 
	{
		wooden_pallisade city requires factions { all, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0 
		{
		capability
			{
				free_upkeep bonus 4
				happiness_bonus bonus 5
				recruitment_slots 2
				tower_level 1
				wall_level 0
				recruit_pool "Peasants"  1   0.3   2  0 requires factions { all, slave, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0
			}
			material wooden 
			construction  2 
			cost  600 
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				wooden_wall
			}
		}

		wooden_wall city requires factions { all, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0 
		{
		capability
			{
				free_upkeep bonus 8
				gate_strength 1
				happiness_bonus bonus 10
				recruitment_slots 4
				tower_level 1
				wall_level 1
				recruit_pool "Peasants"  1   0.3   2  0 requires factions { all, slave, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0
			}
			material wooden 
			construction  2 
			cost  1000 
			settlement_min large_town
			upgrades
			{
				stone_wall
			}
		}

		stone_wall city requires factions { all, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0

			}

			}

			}

building hinterland_roads
{
	levels roads paved_roads highways roads_tree_bonus1 roads_tree_bonus2 roads_tree_bonus3 roads_tree_bonus4 roads_tree_bonus5 
	{
		roads requires factions { all, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0 
		{
		capability
			{
				road_level 0
				cavalry_bonus 1 requires factions { cumans, seljuks, slave, }
			}
			material wooden 
			construction  1 
			cost  400 
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				paved_roads
			}
		}

		paved_roads requires factions { byzantium, cumans, lithuania, seljuks, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0 
		{
		capability
			{
				road_level 1
				cavalry_bonus 2 requires factions { cumans, seljuks, slave, } 
				heavy_cavalry_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { cumans, seljuks, slave, } 
				trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { cumans, seljuks, slave, } 
			}
			material stone 
			construction  2 
			cost  1200 
			settlement_min large_town
			upgrades
			{
				highways
			}
		}

		highways requires factions { byzantium, cumans, lithuania, seljuks, } and event_counter is_player_autonomy 0 
		{
		capability
			{
				road_level 2

building Hungarian_Special_Government
{
